tn.text: "all the people of the nation of Israel". (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
AT: "Rehoboam did not follow the advice"
The "young men" refers to their lack of wisdom and experience in comparison to the old men who had advised Solomon.

tn.ref: who had grown up with him, who stood before him

tn.ref: My little finger is thicker than my father's waist
tn.text: Rehoboam's point is that he is more harsh and demanding than his father. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])

tn.ref: I will punish you with scorpions
tn.text: AT: "but I will whip you with whips that have pieces of metal in them." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
